feedback_feature_disclaimer:
## Notice before submitting a feature request
If you do submit a feature request, the following information will be sent to GitHub issues:
- Your Discord display name, username and ID
- Any information you provide in the title and description in the form

If you don't agree with this, you can open a feature request on the GitHub repository directly.
*This was done to prevent spam and abuse of the feature request system.*
*If you don't want to submit at all, you can completely ignore this message.*
feedback_feature_direct: You can open a feature request on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Akatsuki2555/Akabot/issues/new) directly.
feedback_bug_report_disclaimer:
## Notice before submitting a bug report
If you do submit a bug report, the following information will be sent to GitHub issues:
- Your Discord display name, username and ID
- Any information you provide in the title and description in the form

If you don't agree with this, you can open a bug report on the GitHub repository directly.
*This was done to prevent spam and abuse of the bug report system.*
*If you don't want to submit at all, you can completely ignore this message.*
feedback_bug_report_direct: You can open a bug report on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Akatsuki2555/Akabot/issues/new) directly.
title: Title
feedback_vote: You can click the button below to vote:

leveling_level_up: Congratulations {mention}! You have leveled up to level {level}!
leveling_level_info_self:
## Level Info
You {icon} are on is level {level}.
You {icon} have {level_xp} XP. Next milestone is {next_level_xp} XP for level {next_level}.
The multiplier is currently `{multiplier}x`.
leveling_level_info_another:
## Level Info
{mention} {icon} is on is level {level}.
{mention} {icon} has {level_xp} XP. Next milestone is {next_level_xp} XP for level {next_level}.
The multiplier is currently `{multiplier}x`.

verification_form_word_incorrect: The word you've entered is incorrect

verification_form_math: What is the result of the math problem?
verification_math_incorrect: That answer was wrong. Please try again.
verification_set_role_error_above: The role you are trying to set is above the bot's role.

auto_react_keyword_updated_success: The trigger keyword was updated successfully.
auto_react_emoji_set_success: The react emoji was updated successfully.
auto_response_add_success: Added trigger `{trigger}` that will make the bot reply with `{reply}`
auto_response_list_empty: There are no auto response settings.
auto_response_keyword_updated: The trigger keyword was updated successfully.
auto_response_setting_not_found: The setting was not found. You'll need to run this in the channel where the setting was set.
auto_response_text_updated: The response text was updated successfully.
feedback_about:
# Akabot
Akabot is a Discord bot made by a single developer, Akatsuki2555, featuring Anti Raid, Chat Revive, Chat Summary, Chat Streaks, Leveling, Logging, Moderation, Reaction Roles, Welcome messages, Goodbye messages, Giveaways, Automod Actions, Auto React and Auto Response spanning over English, Czech, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, Russian and Hungarian.
Copyright (C) 2023-2024  Akatsuki2555

This Discord bot is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 any later version.

This Discord bot is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
GNU General Public License for more details.

Discord is a registered trademark of Discord Inc.
cooldown_2: Cooldown! Try again after {minutes} minutes and {seconds} seconds.
command_no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command. Missing {permissions}
command_no_private: This command cannot be used in private messages.
command_bot_no_perm:
The bot is missing permissions to perform this action.
Missing permissions: {permissions}
server_tz_invalid: Invalid timezone. Please use a valid timezone.
command_error_generic: An error occurred while executing this command. An automatic report was created successfully.
antiraid_message_threshold_changed: Successfully set the message threshold to {messages} per {per} seconds.
antiraid_dontspam_message: <@{user_id}>, please do not spam the chat.
giveaways_list_empty: There are no currently running giveaways.
feedback_agree: I agree and want to submit
feedback_prefer_github: I don't agree and prefer to submit on GitHub
translation_not_existing: This text isn't translated, but you can be part of the translation team and help translate it [here](<https://crowdin.com/project/akabot-by-akatsuki2555>)
announcement_file_not_md: The file must be a markdown file.
announcement_no_send_messages_permission: I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.
announcement_none_subscribed: No channels are subscribed to announcements.
announcement_file_not_utf8: The file must be in UTF-8 encoding.
announcement_too_long: The message is too long. Please shorten it.
announcement_channel_not_found: Announcement Channel configured in config.conf not found.
announcement_sent_sending_to_subscribed: Sent to main server, now sending to rest of the servers.
per_user_birthday_announcements_enabled: Birthday announcements are now enabled for this server.
per_user_birthday_announcements_disabled: Birthday announcements are now disabled for this server.
per_user_birthday_reveal_age_enabled: The bot is now allowed to reveal your current age in server announcements and your DM's.
per_user_birthday_reveal_age_disabled: The bot is no longer allowed to reveal your current age in server announcements and your DM's.
per_user_birthday_send_dm_enabled: The bot will now send DM's on your birthday. Please make sure you have DM's allowed.
per_user_birthday_send_dm_disabled: The bot will no longer send DM's on your birthday.
per_user_birthday_cleared: All data about your birthday has been cleared from the database.
birthdays_enable_dms: Please enable DM's for this server or any server with Akabot to receive birthday messages in your DM's.
leveling_set_icon_success: The icon of your leveling card was set successfully.
leveling_set_icon_error: Invalid icon, try again. An icon must be an emoji.
moderation_timeout_error_member_not_foun: Member wasn't found in server. Try again later.
tip_1: You can donate to the bot maintainer using /donate.
tip_2: You can view the bot's website using /website.
tip_3: You can view the bot's changelog using /changelog.
tip_4: You can view the bot's privacy policy using /privacy.
tip_5: You can vote for the bot using /vote.
tip_6: You can edit reaction roles using /edit_reaction_role.
tip_7: You can suggest new features for the bot using /feedback suggest.
tip_8: You can report bugs using /feedback bug.
tip_10: You can self host this bot! The code is open source.
tip_11: If you've got the programming skill, you can contribute! The bot is open source.
tip_12: You can prevent raids by setting a join threshold using /anti_raid join_threshold.
tip_13: You can prevent message spam by setting a message sending threshold using /anti_raid message_threshold.
tip_14: You can add actions to happen automatically on AutoMod rule triggers using /automod_actions.
tip_15: You can get help for individual features by using /help.
tip_16: You can set an automatic ping for your chat revive role by using /chat_revive.
tip_17: You can get summaries of channels using /chat_summary.
tip_18: You can change chat streaks reminders using /user_settings chat_streak_reminders.
tip_19: You can change the language of the bot using /user_settings language.
tip_20: If you own a Discord server, you can change its language using /server_settings language.
tip_21: You can set a timezone for your server using /server_settings timezone.
tip_22: You can set a welcome message for your server using /welcome.
tip_23: You can set a goodbye message for your server using /goodbye.

suggestions_channel_removed: Channel {channel} was removed from suggestion channels.

temporary_vc_max_users_change: Max users of channel {channel} changed to {max_users}
temporary_vc_name_format_change: Default name format of temporary voice channels changed to `{name}`
temporary_vc_error_min_users: You must have at least 2 max users
temporary_vc_error_max_users: You must have at most 99 max users
temporary_vc_error_min_bitrate: You must have at least 8kbps bitrate
temporary_vc_error_max_bitrate: You must have at most 96kbps bitrate
temporary_vc_error_name_too_long: The channel name is too long, it must be at most 16 characters
temporary_vc_error_name_too_short: The channel name is too short, it must be at least 1 character

moderation_remove_moderator_role_respons: Role {role} was removed from moderator roles.
moderation_no_moderator_roles: No moderator roles are currently set.
moderation_no_moderator_role: You don't have a moderator role.
moderation_not_moderator: You are not a moderator. To be a moderator, you must have a role that is in the list of moderator roles.
